NAEB RADIO NETWORK
PROGRAM OFFERING PROGRAM OFFERING
Title: BOOKS IN THE MAKING
Type: Interview-Discussion
Time: 29:30
No,: 13 programs
Origin: University of Chicago Press
Audience: Adult
Serial Number: 57-20
Release Date: Issue 14 (April 7)
This series will bring to light the kinds of problems that lead to the writing of
important non-fiction in America today as well as the problems university presses
solve by publishing these books for the nation’s readers.
Using recent non-fiction as a springboard for discussion, the series will pinpoint
and dissect the message of a specific book each week, using those books with some¬
thing to say of importance to the average American. Only recent books will be
used.
The programs will be recorded from the office of Roger Shugg, Director of the
University of Chicago Press, where writers, scholars and just plain people will
gather to discuss a book of importance.
When the exact books and discussants are made firm, we will supply all stations
with that information.
